definition[0]: relating to the official system which takes letters from one place to another
definition[1]: relating to sending things by post
example[3]: Candidates are chosen by a postal ballot of all party members.
example[4]: Housebound voters should register early for a postal vote.
definition[2]: connected with the official system of sending and receiving letters, parcels etc
example[6]: ThePostal Service (=official system for delivering letters, parcels etc in the United States) has seen a significantly better financial performance.
